name: Lunch in the Garden
description:
Enjoy your garden, enjoy the fruits of your labour. An entry to REGENERATE Game Jam 2022

Your gardener friend invited you over for lunch. Help discover and learn more about the crops and produce to make your wonderful meal!

You’re preparing for a little meal. Search the garden for the ingredients.

Instructions:

This is a clicker game. Search around the area for all of the ingredients; they are scattered, so use your knowledge and intuition to figure out where each plant, herb, vegetable or fruit is growing. 

-----------------------+++-----------------------
